name: Action SuperCross
description:
THE GRANDFATHER OF A GENRE

Action SuperCross is the first of its kind - a physics-based motorbike simulator, inspiring many famous franchises. It is the direct predecessor of Elasto Mania, showcasing the evolution of countless fascinating, unique and experimental concepts and gameplay mechanics.

A CHALLENGE OF SKILL AND STYLE

Maybe you can get through the levels, but can you beat world records? Compete with your friends or watch the replays of the world's top players. Going fast is easy, but being the best of the best is the real challenge.

DECADES OF CONTENT AT YOUR FINGERTIPS

Thanks to the built-in level editor and the community's several-decades-long dedication and support, you are guaranteed to never run out of fun! And with the Workshop, the best content can be made available with a single click.
